Subject: Hot Rod/Epyon/KitKat2

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

He walked into one of the holo rooms, ready to face off against Epyon.
"Lets do it!"

::Epyon::

Epyon walks in after Hot Rod. He quickly lunges at him with a karate
kick. Hot Rod is sent flying back.
"C'mon kid."

::Hot Rod::

"Kid? Man you are dead." He gets up, running at Epyon. The two continue
on fighting.

::KitKat2::

She had looked and looked and no sign of the clone. She walks to her and
DrillBit's room. She lays on the bed and drifts to sleep mode.
